segments.text: I notice the boy reaching into the cookie jar, balancing so precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s going to fall, and the stool is already tilting backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her share, completely unaware of the danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is still drying dishes, not even looking up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just gushing over the sink, and she doesn’t seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting soaked, and it’s going to be a mess to clean up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice, but inside, it’s a disaster waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the boy is going to hurt himself if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman should really turn off the faucet before it gets worse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe how calm everyone is acting right now.
segments.speaker: PAR
